title: Wonderful stay and wonderful staff!
text: We couldn’t have asked for a better experience and stay. Customer service was top notch and the apartment was clean, updated and had 2 lovely terraces. The grocery items were replenished daily and we cooked breakfast every morning. They changed the beds and towels daily and did the dishes too! It’s centrally located, 10 minute walk from the train and right near the water. I would definitely stay again!

title: Unable to get support
text: Had an unrecognized charge from booking.com but could not reach support because they require a booking number but if the issue is that there’s no booking then I’m stuck in an infinite look. I emailed support multiple times, only for them to email me back to call them but when calling them, I can’t get to a person without a booking number.

title: Impossible to contact customer service
text:
Even though I have my currency set to US dollars, Booking.com keeps showing prices in foreign currency. There is no way for me to contact customer service through the app.
This app is highly disappointing

title: Great App , EASY TO WORK WITH 5 STARS
text: App locates hotels, can give you distance from destination, give prices ratings and reviews. Works Great

title: Beautiful villa in a fabulous location
text: The villa was absolutely adorable. The beds and pillows were very comfortable and smelled so nice!  We loved the decorating and the cool vibe of the villa.  Carlos gave us recommendations for grocery stores, and restaurants which we appreciated and used. He was very attentive and answered our questions promptly.  We will definitely come back and bring friends.  The location is outstanding.

title: Great Place to stay
text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Ramada in Oakland, California, near downtown, and let me tell you, it was a great experience! The pricing was just right, which is always a plus. The front desk gentleman and the entire staff were incredibly friendly and welcoming, making me feel right at home. 

As a California native, I appreciated the relaxed and casual vibe throughout my stay. Overall, I couldn't have asked for a better place to unwind and explore the city. The room is a little dated in terms of design, but considering the price, it exceeds expectations in terms of amenities. 

The only other random random observation, there was no fridge or a microwave. It definitely wasn't a big deal sincee I only realized it halfway through my trip and didn't really need them. It didn't make much of a difference to me, but I did notice their absence. 

Overall, this trip has been one of the best I've had in a long time. I’m not sure if I’m supposed to leave a 10 out of 10, a five star, or swipe right but.....you had me at, "I need your credit card and your ID."

title: Terrible customer service
text: I used to swear by Booking, but over the past few years their customer service has gotten terrible! I’ve been left on hold for over 10-mins and then disconnected; been told to wait upwards of 3.5-hours past my scheduled check in time for them to connect with property hosts; and have continually been told to follow up with them because they will not follow up on issues with you. Needless to say, all the properties on Booking are available on other rental websites. I’ve decided to take my business elsewhere

title: Booking.com is just the easiest & Genius rewards really add up!
text: I only use Booking.com for the ease of use, extensive reviews, and quick transaction options.

title: Honorable and trustworthy site!
text:
Booking.com is a travel site you can trust. As a frequent worldwide traveler, this is paramount to me!There are no hidden fees, total pricing is all inclusive. No gimmicks or schemes. They purely offer great service at a fair price.  Comforting!  Cheers to Booking.com!

Kindly,

Tamara~

title: Too many unwanted messages
text: Booking.com does that annoying thing where they’ll send you daily messages about specials in the EAU or other places around the world where you have no plans to visit. I want to turn off notifications but I need them on for important messages about my real bookings. Its easy to find in the preferences how to change email preferences but impossible to figure out how to stop unwanted marketing messages.

title: Security concerns
text:
I have used this app for many years but this year all of the reservations I have made have received phishing messages through the official messaging section of the booking.com app. The messages look official and state that there is a problem with my credit card that will result in my reservation being cancelled within 24 hours unless I click a link and “verify” my payment. 

Each time I have had to spend nearly an hour on the phone with booking.com to find out that the message is fraudulent. 

There is clearly a problem within the booking.com platform that is not being rectified. Although a warning message has been added to the messaging portion of the app, the problem seems very serious.

I am hesitant to use this platform again in the future.

title: App and customer support are
text:
I would strongly go out of my way to warn my friend and family to avoid booking.com and the app. 

First the app is hard to navigate and I couldn’t find my booking details easily. Even after I found it, there were dark patterns making it very difficult to find out how to cancel my serration. I needed to send a cancelation request to the hotel but that was hidden deep in the workflow. The app is designed to make it difficult to request service

title: Great App

title: Best travel agency ever
text:
He utilizado booking.com para mis viajes internacionales y nacionales y hasta hoy todo ha sido exacto como lo esperaba. 

Un solo contratiempo con un taxi booking al llegar a República Dominicana pero fue resuelto al expresar mi queja. 

Tengo vasta experiencia en la hostelería pero siempre utilizo Booking.com para mis hoteles por sus precios ventajosos, la veracidad de sus ofertas y la atención al cliente excepcional.
